name: Kaeya
title: Frostwind Swordsman
intro: The righteous and rigorous Dandelion Knight, and Acting Grand Master of the Knights of Favonius of Mondstadt.

normalAttack.title: Ceremonial Bladework
normalAttack.info:
Normal Attack

Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.

Charged Attack

Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

Plunging Attack

Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skill.title: Frostgnaw
skill.info: Unleashes a frigid blast, dealing Cryo DMG to opponents in front of Kaeya.

burst.title: Glacial Waltz
burst.info:
Coalescing the frost in the air, Kaeya summons 3 icicles that revolve 4 times around him for 8 seconds.
These icicles will follow the character around and deal Cryo DMG to opponents in their path for so long as they persist.

passiveTalents.title: Wind Companion
passiveTalents.info: Every hit with Frostgnaw regenerates HP for Kaeya equal to 15% of his ATK.

passiveTalents.title: Let the Wind Lead
passiveTalents.info: Opponents Frozen by Frostgnaw will drop additional Elemental Particles. Frostgnaw may only produce a maximum of 2 additional Elemental Particles per use.

passiveTalents.title: Guiding Breeze
passiveTalents.info:
Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption of your characters in the party by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.
